titleStmt.title: A letter to a person of quality, occasioned by a printed libel, entituled, The cause of the difference between Tobias Cage esquire, and Mary his wife stated by the said Mary in a letter to a gentleman, for her own vindication: the design, malice, and falshood whereof is hereby detected with proofs by persons of value, on oath, and otherwise.
titleStmt.author: Cage, Tobias.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. [28]: T.C. i.e. Tobias Cage.
Copy trimmed with loss of pagination and text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
